_header: The Book of Jesu Christs kind
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Virgin Mary, conception of
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo Conceptionis Marie’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE Bok of Ihesu cristes kuyndeþe sone of dauid ha we in
                    muynde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He vs graunte of his graceIn his blisse to haue a place.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Liber generaciounis Ihesu cristi fili dauid (f.
                    217va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Proprium Sanctorum, Zusatz-Homilien des Ms. Vernon fol. CCXV zur
                nördlichen Sammlung der Domicalia evangelia.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         81 (1888): 83-114, 300-21.
